DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ejection fraction peak oxygen uptake correlation inspiratory muscle strength , chest wall volume quality life individual heart failure .
DOC.criteria: Will include individual diagnose heart failure , sex , age 1865 year ; hemodynamically stable ( systolic blood pressure ≤ 140 mmHg ; diastolic blood pressure ≤ 90 mmHg ; heart rate = 90 bpm ) ; selfreported sedentary . Will exclude individual unstable angina exclude ; acute myocardial infarction previous surgery three month survey ; musculoskeletal change , respiratory chronic metabolic disease ; treatment steroid , hormone chemotherapy ; gestation ; smoker former smoker asset liability ; inability comply verbal command appraiser unsuitability evaluation device .
